title: So Pulsefire Ezreal's Chat is bugged
body:
It's not major or anything, I just happened to notice when I played a game as Pulsefire Ez just now that in the chat log where it says the IGN and then the Champs name in brackets, i.e this

NinjaNumber12 (Ezreal): GG

Ezreal's name doesn't appear and it in fact looks like this

NinjaNumber 12 (): GG

Not game changing, just thought I'd bring it up.
